Well its been a long time with 6 years of development for the hl series rise and shine, this game is the best valve game i ever played, the game adds the legendary gravity gun and the GODDLY gravity gun at the end, the game adds loot crates so im done breaking boxes for dust and echoes in the previous hl, the acheivements is kinda funny to get them, the game adds soo much things that im just gonna say them: the boat ride, the ravenholm chapter, the new headcrabs, the combines ect ect... So if i have to give a note well is gonna be a... FABULOUS 20/20 THIS GAME IS PERFECT but the cliffhanger at the end is kinda makes you angry because you want to see the end so here's my final verdict.

Wake and Bake Mr Freeman Wake and Bake 10/10

What to say about this game other than its an oldie masterpiece?! The game has great story and good level designs. Fun missions with a variety of concepts. I started my first playthrough on Hard and it has been a top choice - if for nothing else, the "horror" part of the game sure made it more interesting. Besides, where's the fun if you breeze through a gane? It's great to enjoy the game! Took me a bit less than 30h to finish it. Loved every second of it.

The only regret is playing it today in 2022 instead of eighteen years ago. Man but I missed out. You should definitely consider playing it. Check out the "Orange Box" to get additional "episodes" for even more content.
